title: Batman V Superman (2016) NEW HD-TS x264 Exclusive-CPG
description:

[INFO]

Video: x264 2000kbps HD-2Pass
Resolution: 720x400 480p @ 30fps
Audio: Mp3 2.0 Digital Line Audio
Langauge: English
Subtitles: hardcoded English when needed
Source: 1080pHD~Exclusive line audio thx
Encoder: CPG

[b]Notes:[/b]

Well had this source since yesterday but require some extensive work to get the best out of it. its brand new source not hive 720p NightVision source, what?  ah.. does not matter move on..

Video was already zoomed in but pretty damn HD but noisy so i left perspective as it is and fix other stuff as much as possible without losing details.  source is same as Deadpool 2016 1080p HDCAM so i cut video in 4 different parts,  and work on each part separately.

Once i am done with each part then i sync the Exclusive line audio which i fixed at first place which hive and others are using right now.

ENCODE
Fix colors, stablize, sharp, bright, rgb, resize, some walter white blue math Magic and synced audio to my finish video.

Sample included. Cheers ! 

P/S: CPG and Exclusive Group are One since day One.
